subject: Order #SSN1616 partially fullfilled
description_text:
Hi,

I received the pedals from order #SSN1616 quite quickly, thank you for that.

However the haptic feedback motors for the pedals seem that they haven't
been shipped yet, is there any estimate on time when they would be shipped?

Best regards,
Petri Nuppunen

conversations.body_text: Hi Petri Nuppunen,  Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the original shipping date of June 10th has been postponed to an expected window between June 16th and 18th. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We are actively following up with the housing supplier to expedite delivery according to the revised schedule. Since international express shipping is used, the transit time should be relatively fast. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi,

No worries, thanks for the update!

Br,
Petri Nuppunen

ma 9. kesäk. 2025 klo 17.02 service@simsonn.com
Hi，Petri Nuppunen，  感谢您的理解。我们将尽快安排发货。
Hi Petri Nuppunen,  Thank you for your understanding. We will arrange the shipment of your VAM Pro motor as soon as possible.
